General.Name: Henan Jindan Lactic Acid Technology
General.Description: Henan Jindan Lactic Acid Technology Co.,Ltd. produces and sells lactic acid and lactate products in China. It offers calcium lactate, sodium lactate, potassium lactate, ferrous lactate, lactic acid powder, ethyl and methyl lactate, magnesium lactate, zinc lactate, buffered lactic acid, sodium lactate and sodium diacetate blend, and sodium acetate, as well as corn gluten meals, corn germs, and corn brans that are used in food, medical, feed, industry, and biodegradable applications. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Zhoukou, China.

3.Name: Yaojun  Cui
